guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

text.name: instructions
text.value: Please complete the form to help identify risks and ensure a secure workplace environment for all.

radiobutton_copy.jcr:title: 1. Are emergency exits clearly marked and unobstructed?
radiobutton_copy.mandatoryMessage: Provide select one of the options.
radiobutton_copy.name: EmerPrepq1

radiobutton_copy_1213065379.jcr:title: 2. Are emergency evacuation plans posted and visible?
radiobutton_copy_1213065379.mandatoryMessage: Provide select one of the options.
radiobutton_copy_1213065379.name: EmerPrepq2

radiobutton.jcr:title: 3. Are fire extinguishers easily accessible and within their expiration dates?
radiobutton.mandatoryMessage: Provide select one of the options in emergency preparedness.
radiobutton.name: EmerPrepq3

radiobutton_925383028.jcr:title: 4. Additional inputs (if any)
radiobutton_925383028.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_925383028.name: AddInputEP

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.EmerPrep.AddInputEP"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"AddInputEP"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.EmerPrep.EmerPrep"\,"displayName":"Provide details about emergency preparedness"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Emergency Preparedness/Provide details about emergency preparedness/"\,"name":"EmerPrep"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.EmerPrep"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":["if(contains($field\, '0')\, dispatchEvent(EmerPrep\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {})"]\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

textinput_921078093.jcr:title: Provide details
textinput_921078093.mandatoryMessage: Please specify details of the emergency preparedness.
textinput_921078093.name: EmerPrep

radiobutton_copy_cop.jcr:title: 1. Are machines and equipment properly maintained and in safe working condition?
radiobutton_copy_cop.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_copy_cop.name: MachEquipQ1

radiobutton_copy.jcr:title: 2. Are machine guardrails in place and functioning correctly?
radiobutton_copy.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_copy.name: MachEquipQ2

radiobutton.jcr:title: 3. Additional inputs (if any)
radiobutton.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton.name: AddInputMach

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip.AddInputMach"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"AddInputMach"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip.MachEquipDet"\,"displayName":"Provide details about machinery and equipment"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Machinery and Equipment/Provide details about machinery and equipment/"\,"name":"MachEquipDet"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":["if(contains($field\, '0')\, dispatchEvent(MachEquipDet\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {})"]\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

textinput_921078093.jcr:title: Provide details
textinput_921078093.mandatoryMessage: Please specify details about machinery and equipment.
textinput_921078093.name: MachEquipDet

fd:rules.fd:visible: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip.MachEquipDet"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"name":"MachEquipDet"}}\,{"nodeName":"When"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"CONDITIONORALWAYS"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPARISON_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip.AddInputMach"\,"displayName":"3. Additional inputs (if any)"\,"type":"STRING"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Machinery and Equipment/3. Additional inputs (if any)/"\,"name":"AddInputMach"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.MachEquip"}}}\,{"nodeName":"OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}}\,{"nodeName":"Else"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"DONOTHING_OR_HIDE"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"Hide"\,"value":null}}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"contains(AddInputMach\, '0')"\,"eventName":"Visibility"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

radiobutton.jcr:title: 1. Are there any potential hazards present?
radiobutton.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton.name: PotHazPres

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel.PotHazPres"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"PotHazPres"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel.HazQ2"\,"displayName":"2. Are all potential hazards adequately identified and documented within the inspected area?"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Hazard Identification/2. Are all potential hazards adequately identified and documented within the inspected area?/"\,"name":"HazQ2"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":["if(contains($field\, '0')\, dispatchEvent(HazQ2\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {})"]\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

radiobutton_116699772.jcr:title: 2. Are all potential hazards adequately identified and documented within the inspected area?
radiobutton_116699772.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_116699772.name: HazQ2

textinput.jcr:title: Name the hazards which are not documented
textinput.mandatoryMessage: Please name the hazards which are not documented.

radiobutton_92538302.jcr:title: Additional inputs (if any)
radiobutton_92538302.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_92538302.name: AddInputHI

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel.AddInputHI"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"AddInputHI"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel.HazDet"\,"displayName":"Provide details of hazards"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Hazard Identification/Provide details of hazards/"\,"name":"HazDet"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.HazardIdentificationPanel"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":["if(contains($field\, '0')\, dispatchEvent(HazDet\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {})"]\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

textinput_921078093.jcr:title: Provide details
textinput_921078093.mandatoryMessage: Please enter the details of the potential hazards.
textinput_921078093.name: HazDet

radiobutton.jcr:title: 1. Are safety and personal protective equipment (PPE) available and in good condition?
radiobutton.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton.name: SafEquipQ1

radiobutton_686712284.jcr:title: 2. Are all the personnel who need to use safety equipment properly trained on how to use and maintain it?
radiobutton_686712284.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_686712284.name: SafEquipQ2

radiobutton_92538302.jcr:title: 3. Additional inputs (if any)
radiobutton_92538302.mandatoryMessage: Please select one of the options.
radiobutton_92538302.name: AddInputSE

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.SafetyEquipment.AddInputSE"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"AddInputSE"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"CONTAINS"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"0"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.SafetyEquipment.SafEquipDet"\,"displayName":"Provide details of the safety equipment available"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Safety Equipment/Provide details of the safety equipment available/"\,"name":"SafEquipDet"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.SafetyEquipment"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":["if(contains($field\, '0')\, dispatchEvent(SafEquipDet\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {})"]\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

textinput_921078093.jcr:title: Provide details
textinput_921078093.mandatoryMessage: Please specify details of the safety equipment available.
textinput_921078093.name: SafEquipDet

textinput_921078093.jcr:title: Site incharge name
textinput_921078093.description: Name the person in charge of the site.
textinput_921078093.mandatoryMessage: Please provide the name of the person in charge of inspection.
textinput_921078093.name: PersonNameInCharge

dropdown.jcr:title: Department being inspected
dropdown.mandatoryMessage: Please select the department being inspected.
dropdown.name: InspectDepartment

datepicker_721633552.jcr:title: Date of last inspection
datepicker_721633552.mandatoryMessage: Please enter the date of the last inspection.
datepicker_721633552.name: LastInspDt

datepicker.jcr:title: Date of current inspection
datepicker.mandatoryMessage: Please enter the date of current inspection.
datepicker.name: DateOfInspection

fd:rules.fd:validate: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"VALIDATE_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.InspDet.DateOfInspection"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"name":"DateOfInspection"}}\,{"nodeName":"Using"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"Expression"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPARISON_EXPRESSION"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.InspDet.LastInspDt"\,"displayName":"Date of last inspection"\,"type":"DATE"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Inspection Details/Date of last inspection/"\,"name":"LastInspDt"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.InspDet"}}}\,{"nodeName":"OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"IS_BEFORE"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"$form.safetyInspection.InspDet.DateOfInspection"\,"displayName":"Date of current inspection"\,"type":"DATE"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Tabs on Top/Inspection Details/Date of current inspection/"\,"name":"DateOfInspection"\,"parent":"$form.safetyInspection.InspDet"}}}]}\,"nested":false}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"new Date(LastInspDt)<new Date($field)"\,"eventName":"Validate"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

textinput.jcr:title: Name of inspector
textinput.mandatoryMessage: Please enter the name of the inspector.
textinput.name: InspectorName

telephoneinput.jcr:title: Phone number of inspector
telephoneinput.name: PhNoPerInChrg
telephoneinput.validateExpMessage: Please enter a valid US phone number, including the area code. Example: (123) 456-7890
telephoneinput.validatePatternMessage: Please enter a valid US phone number, including the area code. Example: (123) 456-7890

textinput_469479701.jcr:title: Additional comments or recommendations
textinput_469479701.description: You can describe the safety check in detail, along with any recommendations you might want to take into consideration.
textinput_469479701.name: AddComm
